feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.5.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: add granular logging to the logger by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16734
  • feat: onBeforeUpdate AvailabilitySettings prop by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16737
  • feat: Add EXPAND accepting "team" in API V1 Bookings by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16736
  • fix: bookings limits error by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16739
  • chore: revert availability autosave feature by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16742
  • chore: improve api-v2 rate limiting by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16746
  • chore: Default to connected Salesforce account as contact owner by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16747
  • chore: Release v4.5.3 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16728

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.5.2...v4.5.3

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.5.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Use no isolation for unit tests by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16745
  • fix: flaky e2e patterns by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16696
  • refactor: make managed user's name required by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16678
  • chore: fix formatting by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16750
  • fix: more general translation for 'seats 'in NL by @SDeVuyst in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16722
  • chore: booking verification token and booking rejection logic from email by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16324
  • fix: Flakyness on pages that use a hard refresh by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16752
  • fix: update zoom integration doc to include user settings scope by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16724
  • revert: Remove NOT_FOUND error introduced in 16620 by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16753
  • refactor: event limits web wrapper by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16679
  • fix: Issue with zoom meetings getting "invalid Meeting ID" by @askadityapandey in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16669
  • feat: billing tab for platform by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16755
  • refactor: v2 bookings by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16200
  • feat: Update UI of signup / login pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16710
  • feat: global booking limits for teams by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16614
  • fix: add booking limits to SettingsLayoutAppDirClient by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16777
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16775
  • fix: validate managed user timeFormat by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16783
  • feat: add advanced tab attributes to api/v2/event-types by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16314
  • chore: Add summaries for all API v2 endpoints by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16776
  • feat: ics-feed calendar api-v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16735
  • chore: Add sorting to API v2 OpenAPI doc by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16786
  • fix: Error on existing booking when credential is deleted by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16784
  • chore: app router - add env vars for settings/developer and settings/security by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16791
  • fix: All flaky e2e tests by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16758
  • fix: update pr workflow by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16730
  • chore: Improve perf of query that removes disconnected Credentials by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16792
  • feat: Add backlink to booking page by @steven-tey in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16778
  • chore: Release v4.5.4 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16789

New Contributors

  • @SDeVuyst made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16722
  • @askadityapandey made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16669

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.5.3...v4.5.4

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.5.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Failed foreign key constraint check due to daily_video 0 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16798
  • fix: Revert "feat: Update UI of signup / login pages (#16710)" by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16801
  • chore: Release v4.5.5 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16804

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.5.4...v4.5.5

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.5.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: small changes to license page by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16812
  • fix: OOO issue with setting the start and end dates to the same by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16810
  • feat: Improve API v2 docs by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16818
  • chore: Replace campsite.co with campsite.com by @nholden in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16819
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16813
  • fix: selected calendars atom deselect calendar by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16825
  • chore: bump slots rate limit by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16826
  • fix: platform cancel booking webhook not triggered by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16827
  • chore: Allow redirecting /docs to external docs solution by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16836
  • feat: Add hideCalendarEventDetails option to event types by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16817
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16839
  • chore: v4.5.6 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16837

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.5.5...v4.5.6

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.5.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: New UI for SignUp / Login by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16802
  • feat: adding Bolna Voice AI integration for cal.com by @prateeksachan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16828
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16843
  • chore: v4.5.7 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16848

New Contributors

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.5.6...v4.5.7
